ray.rage.asset.mesh.loaders

Class SkeletalMeshLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.asset.mesh.loaders.SkeletalMeshLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssetLoader<Mesh>, MeshLoader, Disposable

    public final class SkeletalMeshLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements MeshLoader
    A mesh-loader capable of processing a custom skeletal animation mesh format created specifically for RAGE. More info about this format can be found in the .rkm Blender 3D file format exporters. The established file extension is .rkm

    The common file extension is .obj.

    Author:
    Luis Gutierrez

        public void loadAsset(Mesh mesh,
                      java.nio.file.Path path)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: AssetLoader
        Reads the data from the specified path on disk, extracts the necessary information, and assigns it to the specified asset.
        Specified by:
        loadAsset in interface AssetLoader<Mesh>
        Parameters:
        mesh - The asset instance to be initialized.
        path - The file system path where the asset's data will be loaded from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the data cannot be read from the file system.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the asset is null

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
